txt.en: This map of the Great River region is covered with markings and symbols indicating plans for the future, though several key pieces have been ripped off and are currently missing. It is likely that these pieces have been distributed among the guards of the tower.
The map on the first floor was incomplete and missing several pieces. It seems likely that these pieces have been distributed to the guards.
There is nothing interesting in this chest
The guards' chests are on the second floor of the tower.\n\nYou should search chests for fragments of the map.
